QuestData.Title: Held For Observation
QuestData.Description:
<Trader Alexxi hurriedly combines the ingredients.>
That should do it. Go on and get this down your direhorn's gullet.
Don't worry, nothing could possibly go wrong with a concoction made under any kind of duress. Also, do I seem like the kind of goblin who would give you something dangerous?
On purpose?
... Don't answer that. Hurry, before they stab me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Administer the remedy to your direhorn.
